name: CUSTOM Testimonials #32
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign sub_heading = section.settings.sub_heading
  assign sub_heading_custom = section.settings.sub_heading_custom
  assign sub_heading_font = section.settings.sub_heading_font
  assign sub_heading_size = section.settings.sub_heading_size
  assign sub_heading_size_mobile = section.settings.sub_heading_size_mobile
  assign sub_heading_height = section.settings.sub_heading_height
  assign sub_heading_color = section.settings.sub_heading_color

  assign heading = section.settings.heading
  assign heading_custom = section.settings.heading_custom
  assign heading_font = section.settings.heading_font
  assign heading_size = section.settings.heading_size
  assign heading_size_mobile = section.settings.heading_size_mobile
  assign heading_height = section.settings.heading_height
  assign heading_color = section.settings.heading_color
  assign heading_mt = section.settings.heading_mt
  assign heading_mt_mobile = section.settings.heading_mt_mobile

  assign review_text = section.settings.review_text
  assign review_text_custom = section.settings.review_text_custom
  assign review_text_font = section.settings.review_text_font
  assign review_text_size = section.settings.review_text_size
  assign review_text_size_mobile = section.settings.review_text_size_mobile
  assign review_text_height = section.settings.review_text_height
  assign review_text_color = section.settings.review_text_color
  assign review_text_mt = section.settings.review_text_mt
  assign review_text_mt_mobile = section.settings.review_text_mt_mobile

  assign active_tabs = section.settings.active_tabs
  assign tabs_gap = section.settings.tabs_gap
  assign tabs_gap_mobile = section.settings.tabs_gap_mobile
  assign tabs_bg_color = section.settings.tabs_bg_color
  assign tabs_border_thickness = section.settings.tabs_border_thickness
  assign tabs_border_color = section.settings.tabs_border_color
  assign tabs_radius = section.settings.tabs_radius

  assign video_tab = section.settings.video_tab
  assign text_tab = section.settings.text_tab
  assign tab_padding_horizontal = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal
  assign tab_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign tab_padding_vertical = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical
  assign tab_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.tab_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign tab_bg_color = section.settings.tab_bg_color
  assign tab_bg_hover_color = section.settings.tab_bg_hover_color
  assign tab_bg_active_color = section.settings.tab_bg_active_color
  assign tab_border_thickness = section.settings.tab_border_thickness
  assign tab_border_color = section.settings.tab_border_color
  assign tab_border_hover_color = section.settings.tab_border_hover_color
  assign tab_border_active_color = section.settings.tab_border_active_color
  assign tab_radius = section.settings.tab_radius
  assign tab_custom = section.settings.tab_custom
  assign tab_font = section.settings.tab_font
  assign tab_size = section.settings.tab_size
  assign tab_size_mobile = section.settings.tab_size_mobile
  assign tab_height = section.settings.tab_height
  assign tab_color = section.settings.tab_color
  assign tab_hover_color = section.settings.tab_hover_color
  assign tab_active_color = section.settings.tab_active_color

  assign navigation_text = section.settings.navigation_text
  assign navigation_text_custom = section.settings.navigation_text_custom
  assign navigation_text_font = section.settings.navigation_text_font
  assign navigation_text_size = section.settings.navigation_text_size
  assign navigation_text_size_mobile = section.settings.navigation_text_size_mobile
  assign navigation_text_height = section.settings.navigation_text_height
  assign navigation_text_color = section.settings.navigation_text_color
  assign navigation_text_hide_mobile = section.settings.navigation_text_hide_mobile

  assign arrow_size = section.settings.arrow_size
  assign arrow_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_size_mobile
  assign arrow_icon_size = section.settings.arrow_icon_size
  assign arrow_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.arrow_icon_size_mobile
  assign arrow_color = section.settings.arrow_color
  assign arrow_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_hover_color
  assign arrow_bg_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_color
  assign arrow_bg_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_bg_hover_color
  assign arrow_radius = section.settings.arrow_radius
  assign arrow_border_thickness = section.settings.arrow_border_thickness
  assign arrow_border_color = section.settings.arrow_border_color
  assign arrow_border_hover_color = section.settings.arrow_border_hover_color
  assign arrow_show_desktop = section.settings.arrow_show_desktop
  assign arrow_show_mobile = section.settings.arrow_show_mobile
  assign arrow_hover_effect = section.settings.arrow_hover_effect

  assign slider_view = section.settings.slider_view
  assign slider_view_mobile = section.settings.slider_view_mobile
  assign slider_gap = section.settings.slider_gap
  assign slider_gap_mobile = section.settings.slider_gap_mobile    
  assign slider_mt = section.settings.slider_mt
  assign slider_mt_mobile = section.settings.slider_mt_mobile

  assign video_ratio = section.settings.video_ratio
  assign video_ratio_mobile = section.settings.video_ratio_mobile
  assign video_border_thickness = section.settings.video_border_thickness
  assign video_border_color = section.settings.video_border_color
  assign video_radius = section.settings.video_radius

  assign play_size = section.settings.play_size
  assign play_size_mobile = section.settings.play_size_mobile
  assign play_radius =section.settings.play_radius
  assign play_bg_color = section.settings.play_bg_color
  assign play_color = section.settings.play_color
  assign play_bg_hover_color = section.settings.play_bg_hover_color
  assign play_hover_color = section.settings.play_hover_color

  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_bg_color = section.settings.card_bg_color
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_padding_vertical = section.settings.card_padding_vertical
  assign card_padding_vertical_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_vertical_mobile
  assign card_padding_horizontal = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal
  assign card_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.card_padding_horizontal_mobile

  assign card_content_align = section.settings.card_content_align
  assign card_content_align_mobile = section.settings.card_content_align_mobile

  assign card_content_horizontal_align = ""
  if card_content_align == "center"
    assign card_content_horizontal_align = "center"
  elsif card_content_align == "right"
    assign card_content_horizontal_align = "end"
  else
    assign card_content_horizontal_align = "start"
  endif

  assign card_content_horizontal_align_mobile = ""
  if card_content_align_mobile == "center"
    assign card_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "center"
  elsif card_content_align_mobile == "right"
    assign card_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "end"
  else
    assign card_content_horizontal_align_mobile = "start"
  endif

  assign stars_icon = section.settings.stars_icon
  assign stars_color = section.settings.stars_color
  assign stars_size = section.settings.stars_size
  assign stars_size_mobile = section.settings.stars_size_mobile

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color
  assign title_mt = section.settings.title_mt
  assign title_mt_mobile = section.settings.title_mt_mobile

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color
  assign text_mt = section.settings.text_mt
  assign text_mt_mobile = section.settings.text_mt_mobile

  assign date_custom = section.settings.date_custom
  assign date_font = section.settings.date_font
  assign date_size = section.settings.date_size
  assign date_size_mobile = section.settings.date_size_mobile
  assign date_height = section.settings.date_height
  assign date_color = section.settings.date_color
  assign date_mt = section.settings.date_mt
  assign date_mt_mobile = section.settings.date_mt_mobile 

  assign video_count = 0
  assign card_count = 0

  for block in section.blocks
    if block.type == 'video'
      assign video_count = video_count | plus: 1
    endif
    if block.type == 'card'
      assign card_count = card_count | plus: 1
    endif
  endfor
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ sub_heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ review_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ tab_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ navigation_text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ date_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .testimonials-top-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-wrap: wrap;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 10px;
  }
  
  .testimonials-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ sub_heading_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ sub_heading_height }}%;
    color: {{ sub_heading_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ heading_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ heading_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ heading_height }}%;
    color: {{ heading_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 700;
  }

  .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin-top: {{ review_text_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ review_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ review_text_height }}%;
    color: {{ review_text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    flex-shrink: 0;
    align-items: center;
    gap: {{ tabs_gap_mobile }}px;
    padding: 5px;
    border: {{ tabs_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tabs_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ tabs_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ tabs_bg_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-tab-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ tab_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_color }};
    font-size: {{ tab_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ tab_height }}%;
    color: {{ tab_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
    font-weight: 400;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .testimonials-tab-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_hover_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_hover_color }};
    color: {{ tab_hover_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .testimonials-tab-{{ section.id }}.active {
    border: {{ tab_border_thickness }}px solid {{ tab_border_active_color }};
    background-color: {{ tab_bg_active_color }};
    color: {{ tab_active_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .testimonials-right-{{ section.id }} {
    flex-shrink: 0;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 15px;
  }

  .testimonials-navigation-text-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    font-size: {{ navigation_text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ navigation_text_height }}%;
    color: {{ navigation_text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 6px;
    margin-left: auto;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    width: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_size_mobile }}px;
    border: 0px;
    border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ arrow_radius }}px;
    background: transparent;
    background: {{ arrow_bg_color }};
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    -webkit-appearance: none;
    /* box-shadow: 0px 0px 10px 0px rgba(0,0,0,.15); */
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon {
    pointer-events: none;
    place-items: center;
    display: grid;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    transform: rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    box-sizing: border-box;
    border-style: solid;
    border: 0px;
    border-right: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-top: 2px solid currentColor;
    position: relative;
    left: -1px;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
    left: unset;
    right: -1px;
    border-right: 0px;
    border-top: 0px;
    border-bottom: 2px solid currentColor;
    border-left: 2px solid currentColor;
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
    content: "";
    grid-area: 1 / -1;
    transition: all .2s ease;
    width: {{ arrow_icon_size_mobile | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    height: 1.6px;
    transform-origin: center;
    opacity: 0;
    background: currentColor;
    transform: scaleX(.5);
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} span,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} span {
    color: {{ arrow_color }};
  }

  .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled,
  .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}.swiper-button-disabled {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }},
  .testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-top: {{ slider_mt_mobile }}px !important;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}.active,
  .testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: flex !important;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }} video,
  .testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    border: 0;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
  }
  
  .testimonials-play-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    position: absolute;
    top: 50%;
    left: 50%;
    z-index: 2;
    transform: translate(-50%, -50%);
    background-color: {{ play_bg_color }};
    border-radius: {{ play_radius }}px;
    padding: {{ play_size_mobile | times: 0.7 }}px;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    cursor: pointer;
    will-change: transform;
  }

  .testimonials-play-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: block;
  }

  .testimonials-play-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    background: none;
    width: {{ play_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ play_size_mobile }}px;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .testimonials-play-{{ section.id }} svg {
    fill: {{ play_color }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .testimonials-slider-card-wrapper-{{ section.id }} {
    align-items: stretch !important;
  }

  .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    border: {{ video_border_thickness }}px solid {{ video_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ video_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
    cursor: pointer;
  }

  .testimonials-slide-card-{{ section.id }} {
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    display: flex !important;
    flex-direction: column !important;
    justify-content: space-between !important;
    height: auto !important;
    padding: {{ card_padding_vertical_mobile }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal_mobile }}px;
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ card_bg_color }};
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .testimonials-stars-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex;
    align-items: end;
    justify-content: {{ card_content_horizontal_align_mobile }};
    gap: 2px;
  }

  .testimonials-stars-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .testimonials-stars-{{ section.id }} img {
    display: block;
    width: {{ stars_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ stars_size_mobile }}px;
    object-fit: cover;
  }
  
  .testimonials-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    text-align: {{ card_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ title_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ card_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ text_mt_mobile }}px;
  }

  .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0px;   
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .testimonials-date-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0px;
    text-align: {{ card_content_align_mobile }};
    margin-top: {{ date_mt_mobile }}px;
    font-size: {{ date_size_mobile }}px;
    line-height: {{ date_height }}%;
    color: {{ date_color }};
    text-transform: unset;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .testimonials-top-{{ section.id }} {
      flex-wrap: nowrap;
    }
    
    .testimonials-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ sub_heading_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ heading_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ heading_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ review_text_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ review_text_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-tabs-{{ section.id }} {
      gap: {{ tabs_gap }}px;    
    }

    .testimonials-tab-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ tab_padding_vertical }}px {{ tab_padding_horizontal }}px;    
      font-size: {{ tab_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-navigation-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-size: {{ navigation_text_size }}px;
    }
    
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }},
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} {
      width: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_size }}px;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:before {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ arrow_icon_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} .animate-icon:after {
      width: {{ arrow_icon_size | minus: 0.3 }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }},
    .testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem !important;
      margin-top: {{ slider_mt }}px !important;
    }

    .testimonials-slide-card-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ card_padding_vertical }}px {{ card_padding_horizontal }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-play-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ play_size | times: 0.7 }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-play-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ play_size }}px;
      height: {{ play_size }}px;
    }
    
    .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }}:hover .testimonials-play-{{ section.id }} {
      background-color: {{ play_bg_hover_color }};
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }

    .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }}:hover .testimonials-play-{{ section.id }} svg {
      fill: {{ play_hover_color }};
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }


    .testimonials-stars-{{ section.id }} {
      justify-content: {{ card_content_horizontal_align }};
    }

    .testimonials-stars-{{ section.id }} svg,
    .testimonials-stars-{{ section.id }} img {
      width: {{ stars_size }}px;
      height: {{ stars_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-title-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ title_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ card_content_align }}
    }

    .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ card_content_align }};
      margin-top: {{ text_mt }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }

    .testimonials-date-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ date_mt }}px;
      font-size: {{ date_size }}px;
      text-align: {{ card_content_align }}
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if sub_heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-subheading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ sub_heading_font.family }}, {{ sub_heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ sub_heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ sub_heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if heading_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ heading_font.family }}, {{ heading_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ heading_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ heading_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if review_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ review_text_font.family }}, {{ review_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ review_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ review_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if tab_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-tab-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ tab_font.family }}, {{ tab_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ tab_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ tab_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if navigation_text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-navigation-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ navigation_text_font.family }}, {{ navigation_text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ navigation_text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ navigation_text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if navigation_text_hide_mobile %}
  <style>
    @media (max-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-navigation-text-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-text-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if date_custom %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-date-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ date_font.family }}, {{ date_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ date_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ date_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_hover_effect == "color" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;
      border: {{ arrow_border_thickness }}px solid {{ arrow_border_hover_color }};
      background: {{ arrow_bg_hover_color }};
    }
  
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon {
      color: {{ arrow_hover_color }};
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "scale" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      transform: scale(0.9);
    }

    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover,
      .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover {
        transform: scale(0.9);
      }
    }
  </style>
{% elsif arrow_hover_effect == "arrow" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
  
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:before {
      transform: translate(calc(-1 * 0.125rem)) rotate(calc(1 * 45deg));
    }
    
    .testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after,
    .testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}:hover .animate-icon:after {
      opacity: 1;
      transform: scaleX(1);
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_mobile %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
   .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if arrow_show_desktop %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: flex;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }} {
        display: none;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}


{% if video_ratio_mobile == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
    }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio_mobile == "landscape" %}
  <style>
  .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
    aspect-ratio: 12/8;
  }
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio_mobile == "square" %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: 12/12;
    }
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
    .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
      aspect-ratio: auto;
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if video_ratio == "portrait" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 9.6/13;
      }
    }
    
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "landscape" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/8;
      }
    }  
  </style>
{% elsif video_ratio == "square" %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: 12/12;
      }
    }    
  </style>
{% else %}
  <style>
     @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} {
        aspect-ratio: auto;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% comment %} PREVIEW {% endcomment %}
<style>
  .product-reviews-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .swiper-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .product-reviews-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .product-reviews-item-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
  }

  .product-reviews-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .product-reviews-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
    margin-left: {{ slider_gap_mobile }}px;
  } 

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {
    .product-reviews-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .product-reviews-item-{{ section.id }}:not(:first-child) {
      margin-left: {{ slider_gap }}px;
    } 

    .product-reviews-slider-{{ section.id }}.preview .product-reviews-item-{{ section.id }} {
      width: calc(100% / {{ slider_view }} - ({{ slider_gap }}px));
    }
  }
</style>


<div class="section-{{ section.id }} testimonials-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      <div class="testimonials-top-{{ section.id }}">
        <div class="testimonials-left-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if sub_heading != blank %}
            <div class="testimonials-subheading-{{ section.id }}">{{ sub_heading }}</div>
          {% endif %}
          {% if heading != blank %}
            <div class="testimonials-heading-{{ section.id }}">{{ heading }}</div>
          {% endif %}
          {% if review_text != blank %}
            <div class="testimonials-review-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ review_text }}</div>
          {% endif %}
        </div>
        <div class="testimonials-tabs-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if video_count != 0 %}
            <p class="testimonials-tab-{{ section.id }} testimonials-video-tab-{{ section.id }} {% if active_tabs == 'video' %}active{% endif %}"> {{ video_tab }}</p>
          {% endif %}

          {% if card_count != 0 %}
            <p class="testimonials-tab-{{ section.id }} testimonials-text-tab-{{ section.id }}  {% if active_tabs == 'text' %}active{% endif %}"> {{ text_tab }}</p>
          {% endif %}
        </div>
        <div class="testimonials-right-{{ section.id }}">
          {% if navigation_text != blank %}
            <p class="testimonials-navigation-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ navigation_text }}</p>
          {% endif %}
          <div class="testimonials-buttons-{{ section.id }}">
            <button class="testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }} testimonials-btn-{% if active_tabs == 'video' %}video{% else %}text{% endif %}-prev-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>
            <button class="testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }} testimonials-btn-{% if active_tabs == 'text' %}text{% else %}video{% endif %}-next-{{ section.id }}">
              <span class="animate-icon"></span>
            </button>  
          </div>         
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }} swiper {% if active_tabs == 'video' %}active{% endif %}"
          data-gap="{{ slider_gap }}"
          data-gap-mobile="{{ slider_gap_mobile }}"
          data-view="{{ slider_view }}"
          data-view-mobile="{{ slider_view_mobile }}">
        <div class="swiper-wrapper">                   
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.type == 'video' %}
              <div class="testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }} none swiper-slide">
                {% assign video_id = block.settings.video_url.id %}
                {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                {%- if block.settings.video_url != null -%}
                  {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                  <iframe
                    {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"                    
                    allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                    allowfullscreen
                    class="lazy"
                  ></iframe>
                  {%- else -%}
                  <iframe
                    {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=0&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&muted=0&autoplay=1&controls=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=0&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                    allowfullscreen
                    class="lazy"
                  ></iframe>
                  {% endif %}                   
                {% else %}
                  {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}                          
                  <video {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{% if block.settings.video != blank %}{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" playsinline preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>                  
                {% endif %}     
                <div class="testimonials-play-{{ section.id }} active">
                  <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="26" height="26" fill="currentColor" viewBox="0 0 256 256">
                    <path d="M240,128a15.74,15.74,0,0,1-7.6,13.51L88.32,229.65a16,16,0,0,1-16.2.3A15.86,15.86,0,0,1,64,216.13V39.87a15.86,15.86,0,0,1,8.12-13.82,16,16,0,0,1,16.2.3L232.4,114.49A15.74,15.74,0,0,1,240,128Z"></path>
                  </svg>
                </div>          
              </div>
            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}        
        </div>        
      </div>
      <div class="testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }} swiper {% if active_tabs == 'text' %}active{% endif %}"
          data-gap="{{ slider_gap }}"
          data-gap-mobile="{{ slider_gap_mobile }}"
          data-view="{{ slider_view }}"
          data-view-mobile="{{ slider_view_mobile }}">
        <div class="swiper-wrapper testimonials-slider-card-wrapper-{{ section.id }}">     
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.type == 'card' %}
              <div class="testimonials-slide-card-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide">
                <div class="testimonials-slide-top-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.stars_count != 0 %}             
                    <div class="testimonials-stars-{{ section.id }}">
                      {% if stars_icon != blank %}
                        {% assign stars_count_round = block.settings.stars_count | round: 0 %}
                        {% for item in (1..stars_count_round) %}
                          <img src="{{ stars_icon | image_url }}" alt="{{ stars_icon.alt }}">
                        {% endfor %}
                      {% else %}
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                          {% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1  %}
                            <defs>
                              <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}6">
                                <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                              </linearGradient>
                            </defs>
                          {% endif %}
                          <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1 %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 0 and block.settings.stars_count < 1 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}6){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 0.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                        </svg>
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                          {% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2  %}
                            <defs>
                              <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}7">
                                <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                              </linearGradient>
                            </defs>
                          {% endif %}
                          <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2 %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 1 and block.settings.stars_count < 2 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}7){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 1.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                        </svg>
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                          {% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3  %}
                            <defs>
                              <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}8">
                                <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                              </linearGradient>
                            </defs>
                          {% endif %}
                          <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3 %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 2 and block.settings.stars_count < 3 %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}8){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 2.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                        </svg>
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                          {% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}
                            <defs>
                              <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}9">
                                <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                              </linearGradient>
                            </defs>
                          {% endif %}
                          <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 3 and block.settings.stars_count < 4  %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}9){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 3.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                        </svg>
                        <svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="20" height="19" viewBox="0 0 20 19" fill="none">
                          {% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}
                            <defs>
                              <linearGradient id="grad{{ section.id }}10">
                                <stop offset="0%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="{{ stars_color }}" />
                                <stop offset="50%" stop-color="transparent" />
                                <stop offset="100%" stop-color="transparent" />
                              </linearGradient>
                            </defs>
                          {% endif %}
                          <path {% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}stroke="{{ stars_color }}"{% endif %} d="M10 0L12.9389 5.95492L19.5106 6.90983L14.7553 11.5451L15.8779 18.0902L10 15L4.12215 18.0902L5.24472 11.5451L0.489435 6.90983L7.06107 5.95492L10 0Z" fill="{% if block.settings.stars_count > 4 and block.settings.stars_count < 5  %}url(#grad{{ section.id }}10){% elsif block.settings.stars_count > 4.5 %}{{ stars_color }}{% endif %}"></path>
                        </svg>
                      {% endif %}
                    </div>                 
                  {% endif %} 
                  {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                    <p class="testimonials-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <div class="testimonials-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
                {% if block.settings.date != blank %}
                  <p class="testimonials-date-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.date }}</p>
                {% endif %}
              </div>
            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}      
        </div>        
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
{% if lazy %}
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>
{% endif %}

<script>
  function initTestimonials32() {
    {% if lazy %}
      let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();
  
      window.addEventListener(
        "LazyLoad::Initialized",
        function (event) {
          window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
        },
        false
      );
    {% endif %}
    
    let sliderTestimonial, sliderVideo;

    let sliderTestimonialWrap = document.querySelector('.testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}');
    let sliderVideoWrap = document.querySelector('.testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}');

    const videoTab = document.querySelector('.testimonials-video-tab-{{ section.id }}');
    const testimonialTab = document.querySelector('.testimonials-text-tab-{{ section.id }}');
    const btnPrev = document.querySelector('.testimonials-btn-prev-{{ section.id }}');
    const btnNext = document.querySelector('.testimonials-btn-next-{{ section.id }}');

    function initializeSliderTestimonial() {
      sliderTestimonial = new Swiper(".testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}", {
        speed: 300,
        navigation: {
          nextEl: '.testimonials-btn-text-next-{{ section.id }}',
          prevEl: '.testimonials-btn-text-prev-{{ section.id }}',
        },
        breakpoints: {
          320: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
            slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile || 1),
          },
          768: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
            slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view || 3),
          },
          1024: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
            slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view || 3),
          }
        }
      });
    }

    function initializeSliderVideo() {
      sliderVideo = new Swiper(".testimonials-slider-video-{{ section.id }}", {
        speed: 300,
        navigation: {
          nextEl: '.testimonials-btn-video-next-{{ section.id }}',
          prevEl: '.testimonials-btn-video-prev-{{ section.id }}',
        },
        breakpoints: {
          320: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
            slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.viewMobile || 1),
          },
          768: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
            slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view || 3),
          },
          1024: {
            spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gap || 0),
            slidesPerView: parseFloat(document.querySelector(`.testimonials-slider-card-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.view || 3),
          }
        }
      });
    }

    function switchTabToVideo() {
      testimonialTab.classList.remove('active');
      videoTab.classList.add('active');
      sliderTestimonialWrap.classList.remove('active');
      sliderVideoWrap.classList.add('active');

      if (btnPrev && btnNext) {
        btnPrev.classList.remove(`testimonials-btn-text-prev-{{ section.id }}`, `testimonials-btn-text-next-{{ section.id }}`);
        btnNext.classList.remove(`testimonials-btn-text-prev-{{ section.id }}`, `testimonials-btn-text-next-{{ section.id }}`);
        btnPrev.classList.add(`testimonials-btn-video-prev-{{ section.id }}`);
        btnNext.classList.add(`testimonials-btn-video-next-{{ section.id }}`);
      }

      if (sliderTestimonial) {
        sliderTestimonial.destroy(true, true);
      }
      initializeSliderVideo();
    }

    function switchTabToTestimonial() {
      testimonialTab.classList.add('active');
      videoTab.classList.remove('active');
      sliderTestimonialWrap.classList.add('active');
      sliderVideoWrap.classList.remove('active');

      if (btnPrev && btnNext) {
        btnPrev.classList.remove(`testimonials-btn-video-prev-{{ section.id }}`, `testimonials-btn-video-next-{{ section.id }}`);
        btnNext.classList.remove(`testimonials-btn-video-prev-{{ section.id }}`, `testimonials-btn-video-next-{{ section.id }}`);
        btnPrev.classList.add(`testimonials-btn-text-prev-{{ section.id }}`);
        btnNext.classList.add(`testimonials-btn-text-next-{{ section.id }}`);
      }

      if (sliderVideo) {
        sliderVideo.destroy(true, true);
      }
      initializeSliderTestimonial();
    }

    initializeSliderTestimonial();
    initializeSliderVideo();

    if (videoTab) {
      videoTab.addEventListener('click', switchTabToVideo);
    }

    if (testimonialTab) {
      testimonialTab.addEventListener('click', switchTabToTestimonial);
    }

    const videos = document.querySelectorAll(`.testimonials-slide-video-{{ section.id }}`);

    videos.forEach(item => {
      const video = item.querySelector('video');
      const iframe = item.querySelector('iframe');   
      const videoButton = item.querySelector(`.testimonials-play-{{ section.id }}`);
      
      item.addEventListener('click', () => {       
        videos.forEach(otherItem => {
          const otherVideo = otherItem.querySelector('video');
          const otherIframe = otherItem.querySelector('iframe');
          const otherButton = otherItem.querySelector(`.testimonials-play-{{ section.id }}`);
          
          if (otherItem !== item) {
            if (otherVideo) {
              otherVideo.pause();
              otherVideo.controls = false;
            }
            if (otherIframe) {
              otherIframe.src = otherIframe.getAttribute('data-src2');
            }
            if (otherButton) {
              otherButton.classList.add('active');
            }
          }
        });

        setTimeout(() => {            
          if(videoButton.classList.contains('active')) {
            if(video) {
              video.play();
              video.controls = true; 
            }
            if(iframe) {
              iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1');
            }   
          } else {
            if(video) {
              video.pause();
              video.controls = false; 
            }
            if(iframe) {
              iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src2');
            }           
          }  
          videoButton.classList.toggle('active'); 
        }, 400)
      });
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initTestimonials32);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initTestimonials32);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initTestimonials32);
  }
</script>

background_gradient.label: Section background gradient
background_gradient.description: Remove gradient to replace with solid colors

lazy.label: Lazy load
lazy.description: Lazy load media for speed optimisation
